name: The Witch Tower
description:
A little game made in PICO-8 for the GBJAM #8. Still unfinished and unbalanced, but that was what I could do in the timeframe of the jam. Had much fun!

Controls: arrow keys to move and shoot, Z and X to start the game. Using the Enter key you can also pause the game.

And thank you for checking my game, I really appreciate!

- Alex
